earth.main: Mostly Harmless. Located in ZZ9 Plural Z Alpha.
more: Although the primitive ape-descended denizens of this planet did not realize it, the Earth was designed by a supercomputer called Deep Thought, and was built by the Magratheans.
Slartibartfast won an award for his fjords on the coast of Norway.
It was destroyed by the Vogons five minutes before the completion of its program.

american express.main: The American Express Card is not accepted anywhere in the known Universe.
